text: [Music]
I have deep respect for Geor Soros he
bets his own money and
he he takes responsibility for what he's
doing and if he loses he loses himself
and if he wins he wins himself and he
uses the money in a way that I approve
of we have corporated in the past of
projects in Eastern Europe and I have
deep respect for his commitment a few
days ago we shared a panel at Columbia
University discussing the consequences
of
globalization he is an
American capitalist very rich person he
lives
in in the market literally every day
whereas I'm a Social Democrat when I
outline my views of
globalization he called me a market
fundamentalist I think that was very
amusing Swedish social democracy by
welcoming globalization by opening his
border to foreign trade to Imports by
supporting flexibility and structural
change in the economy is considered to
be a market fundamentalist by George
Soros I think that was very amusing in
many areas J stiglitz and I share the
same views in some areas we don't in
some areas he has views that I I I'm not
well informed enough to have have an
opinion on my own but I feel that uh
when I want to take a stand stand on a
new issue that I haven't
carefully uh thought through I don't
feel that my analysis is fully complete
before I've
consulted uh Professor stiglitz I think
he is very very smart he's uh follows
Economic Policy debate and uh
theoretical debate in a way that he can
Bridge the perspectives that is very
unusual he is more skeptical to
globalization than I am he focuses very
very much on risks and problem s and uh
I perhaps because I come from a small
country that is dependent upon the rest
of the world I focus more on what we can
do to be beneficiaries to make it work
for us and uh that may be one of the
main differences but we also cooperated
we have written articles together in the
past in the financial times on financial
regulation for instance and on uh the
use of uh offshore Financial Centers how
that has uh caused problems for us in in
various respects and I I don't want to
exaggerate our
differences but I'm I'm deeply impressed
by his uh command of theory and practice
at the same time that is very unusual
